segments.text: When you need an apartment , where do you look for one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our school has a link on its website for apartments .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I share an apartment with someone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some of the ads in the paper are from people looking for roommates .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are apartments expensive in this city ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you need a single apartment , or is this for two people ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can get that type of apartment for around fifteen hundred dollars a month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you have time to go look at apartments with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love apartment hunting . I â€™ ll be happy to go with you .
segments.speaker: S2
